Generally clear PERIOD Low 44F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



The National Alliance on Mental Illness NAMI has expanded on ECUs campus since its foundation last year PERIOD NAMI continues to offer support for students family and friends of people with mental illness PERIOD This education and advocacy group is making its mark and providing much needed help to this university PERIOD

NAMI encourages students and those just wanting information on helping a loved one to come to their monthly meetings PERIOD Information discussed in the open meetings will be kept confidential PERIOD Every meeting there are speakers that are experts in a certain area of mental health PERIOD In the past theyve included speakers on bipolar disorder nutrition mental health and drug and alcohol abuse PERIOD

This grass roots organization has already helped a number of students at ECU PERIOD Recently NAMI supported the family of one of its members after an accidental death PERIOD NAMI is committed and dedicated to helping its member in their time of need PERIOD

Olivia Murray and Carlos Murray are the advisors and founders for this organization and their phone lines are always open to the public and those wanting more information on NAMI PERIOD NAMI president Erick Smithwick has made it clear that theres a need for this organization on campus and that its involvement at ECU will continue to strengthen PERIOD

NAMI is concerned with lowering suicides on campus and offers support education and advocacy for its members who are primarily students suffering from mental illness or students with family or friends who suffer from mental illness PERIOD

NAMI caters to all mental illness not just the larger more wellknown ones like bipolar disorder PERIOD They have information and support for illnesses ranging from borderline personality disorder to anorexia PERIOD NAMI is a grass roots organization but does accept financial contributions from members businesses and organizations wanting to help PERIOD

The members of NAMI have a few things in store for this spring semester other than wonderful and knowledgeable speakers at their monthly meetings PERIOD They are looking forward to participating in more on campus involvement with an upcoming bake sale PERIOD

NAMI also will be traveling to the Spring State NAMI Convention held in Raleigh N.C. this April PERIOD This year NAMI at ECU will again be honored and remembered for being the first and the only NAMI on a North Carolina State University Campus PERIOD

NAMIs main goal is to start its own mental health library much like the Pitt County NAMI library PERIOD This library would serve as a research facility and a place to get literature to help educate students and members on mental illnesses PERIOD NAMI ECU would also like to attend the National NAMI Convention in which all the NAMI organizations nationwide would come together PERIOD

 said Pitt County Mental Health Director Debbie Dihoff PERIOD
